languages.text: "Раз у тебя есть самописное устройство, буду диктовать тебе свои мемуары. Итак, начнем, пожалуй, с моего детства...".
"Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate my memoirs to you. Let us start with my childhood..."
languages.original_text: "Раз у тебя есть самописное устройство, буду диктовать тебе свои мемуары. Итак, начнем, пожалуй, с моего детства...".

traits.locale_text: "Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate you my memoirs. Let us start from my childhood..."
"Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate you my memoirs. Let us start from my childhood..."
"Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate my memoirs to you. Let us start with my childhood..."
"Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate my memoirs to you. Let us start with my childhood..."
"Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate my memoirs to you. Let us start with my childhood..."
"Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate my memoirs to you. Let us start with my childhood..."

languages.text: 「羽ペンの用意ができているようだな。{mf|俺|私}の回想録を口述してやろう。まずは幼少期から始めるとするか…」
languages.original_text: "Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate my memoirs to you. Let us start with my childhood..."

traits.locale_text: 「羽ペンの用意ができているようだな。{mf|俺|私}の回想録を口述してやろう。まずは幼少期から始めるとするか…」

languages.text: "Da ihr eure Schreibfedern bereit habt, werde ich euch meine Memoiren diktieren. Wir beginnen mit meiner Kindheit ..."
languages.original_text: "Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate my memoirs to you. Let us start with my childhood..."

traits.locale_text: "Da ihr eure Schreibfedern bereit habt, werde ich euch meine Memoiren diktieren. Wir beginnen mit meiner Kindheit ..."

languages.text: « Puisque vous avez déjà sorti vos plumes, je vais en profiter pour vous dicter mes mémoires. Commençons par mon enfance... »
languages.original_text: "Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate my memoirs to you. Let us start with my childhood..."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque vous avez déjà sorti vos plumes, je vais en profiter pour vous dicter mes mémoires. Commençons par mon enfance... »

languages.text: «Ya que tenéis las plumas listas, empezaré a dictaros mis memorias. Empecemos por mi infancia...».
languages.original_text: "Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate my memoirs to you. Let us start with my childhood..."

traits.locale_text: «Ya que tenéis las plumas listas, empezaré a dictaros mis memorias. Empecemos por mi infancia...».

languages.text: “既然连羽毛笔都准备好了，那我就口述一下关于我的回忆录吧。不如就从我的童年说起吧……”
languages.original_text: "Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate my memoirs to you. Let us start with my childhood..."

traits.locale_text: “既然连羽毛笔都准备好了，那我就口述一下关于我的回忆录吧。不如就从我的童年说起吧……”

languages.text: "Hazır kalemleriniz yanınızdayken sizlere anılarımı yazdırmak isterim. Çocukluğumdan başlayalım."
languages.original_text: "Since you have your quills ready, I shall dictate my memoirs to you. Let us start with my childhood..."

traits.locale_text: "Hazır kalemleriniz yanınızdayken sizlere anılarımı yazdırmak isterim. Çocukluğumdan başlayalım."
